data.title: Download for PC Free
data.meta_description: Download MediaCoder Free. MediaCoder converts your videos to any format. Download MediaCoder for free and make your videos compatible with any video player in a few simple steps. A lot of the files downloaded from the Internet aren't 100% compatible with some of the devices on which we want to...
data.text:
Change the codec of any of your multimedia files

A lot of the files downloaded from the Internet aren't 100% compatible with some of the devices on which we want to play them, even though they are in the same format or a very similar one, and due to this, we need a tool with which we can change the codec of one or more files simultaneously.

Convert the codec of your multimedia files

To complete this task, one of the best options that we can choose is MediaCoder, a lightweight application with which we will be able to change the codec of any file without any problems, because all we will have to do is import a file, choose the codec of our choice from a list and click on the button to convert files.
